item.title: Understated Classics #16: Ambient 2 / The Plateaux Of Mirror by Howard Budd and Brian Eno
item.description:
Among Fields of Crystal / Wind in Lonely Fences

I have written about a fair number of ambient albums in this series (and there are at least two more to come!) but perhaps none are as unobtrusive as this one by Howard Budd and Brian Eno. Itâ€™s a subtle collection of music that sits at the margins of your consciousness: for a long time it was the music that I turned to when I could not sleep but I could just as easily imagine it as (ahem!) romantic background music as I could something to work to. I actually bought it in 2006 to listen to on an overnight flight back from the US.
